author: tgannon
title: Wayne Rooney transfer news: Manchester United star snubbed mega payday in Chinese Super League as he wants to break Peter Shilton’s England record
text:
EFL Wayne's mission Wayne Rooney transfer news: Manchester United star snubbed mega payday in Chinese Super League as he wants to break Peter Shilton’s England record 
Three Lions captain wants to become all-time highest capped player for his country and feels a move away from Prem would have ruined his chances of overtaking the legendary keeper Exclusive
